title: Criticism of the Western Civilization - Col. 71 (WW-I, WW-II)
description:
Criticism of the Western Civilization - Collection 71 (WW-I, WW-II 6):

We have 28 titles here:

-  Barry et al (Eds.) - Small Nations and Colonial Peripheries in World War I (2016)

-  Bennett & Howlett (Eds.) - Antiwar Dissent and Peace Activism in World War I America (2014)

-  Bourrie - The Fog of War; Censorship of Canada's Media in World War Two (2011)

-  Byrd - A World in Flames; a Concise History of World War II (1969)

-  der Kloot - The Lessons of War; the Experiences of Seven Future Leaders in the First World War (2008)

-  Dziewanowski - War at Any Price; World War II in Europe, 1939-1945 (1987)

-  Ferguson - The First World War; a Miscellany (2014)

-  Fried - Austro-Hungarian War Aims in the Balkans During World War I (2014)

-  Friend - The Twentieth Century; 100 Years of War (2016)

-  Fromkin - Europe's Last Summer; Who Started the Great War in 1914 (2004)

-  Fussell - The Great War and Modern Memory (2013)

-  Gillies - The Barbed-Wire University; the Real Lives of Prisoners of War in the Second World War (2011)

-  Goldstein - 101 Amazing Facts about the First World War (2014)

-  Goldstein - 101 Amazing Facts about the Second World War (2014)

-  Gregory - A War of Peoples, 1914-1919 (2014)

-  Hayward - Myths & Legends of the First World War (2011)

-  Hicks - The Comfort Women; Japan's Brutal Regime of Enforced Prostitution in the Second World War (1994)

-  Jones et al (Eds.) - Untold War; New Perspectives in First World War Studies (2008)

-  Keene & Neiberg (Eds.) - Finding Common Ground; New Directions in First World War Studies (2011)

-  MacMillan - The War That Ended Peace; How Europe Abandoned Peace for the First World War (2013)

-  Miscamble - The Most Controversial Decision; Truman, the Atomic Bombs, and the Defeat of Japan (2011)

-  Parsons - Voices from World War 1; Letters from the Front (2014)

-  Pieper - Fegelein's Horsemen and Genocidal Warfare; the SS Cavalry Brigade in the Soviet Union (2015)

-  Qiu, Zhiliang & Lifei - Chinese Comfort Women; Testimonies from Imperial Japan's Sex Slaves (2013)

-  Traverso - Fire and Blood; the European Civil War, 1914-1945 (2016)

-  Ulrichsen - The First World War in the Middle East (2014)

-  Waters - Australia and Appeasement; Imperial Foreign Policy and the Origins of World War II (2012)

-  Willis (Ed.) - The War; Stories of Life and Death from World War II (1999)
